title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Donate
body: Donate       Ocmulgee National Monument is very appreciative of donations and support. If you wish to help support Ocmulgee National Monument with projects and operations, please contact us at (478) 752-8257, or mail a check payable to: Ocmulgee National Monument 1207 Emery Hwy. Macon, GA 31217 Attn: Administrator Officer You can also donate to the Ocmulgee National Monument Association, a tax exempt, non-profit organization that helps support interpretation, education, and preservation of our park. Anyone wishing to donate to the association you can mail a check payable to: Ocmulgee National Monument Association 1207 Emery Hwy. Macon, GA 31217
